meanings: Noun 英 (자세한) 설명서, 사양(仕樣) (→specification, specs)
Noun [미·속어] (서커스의) 개막 퍼레이드, 호화판 TV 쇼
Society for Pollution and Environmental Control, South Pacific Bureau for Economic Cooperation(남태평양 경제 협력 기구). <참고> SPF

vlive.korean: 그냥 진짜 시중에 파는 거 사온 거야 아니면 제작한 거예요? from the store or were they specially made? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 🖐2019 안녕 2020🖐
vlive.english: from the store or were they specially made?

vlive.korean: [첫 데이트 때] [윤아의 말을 기억한 승혁] 써봤어? [Seunghyuk remembered what Yoonah said,] [on the first date] Specially? 듣기 View video 잼플리 Jamfully : 여사친과 썸 탈 때 씁쓸한 순간 [썸타는일주일] EP.03
vlive.english: [Seunghyuk remembered what Yoonah said,] [on the first date] Specially?

vlive.korean: 특별히 준비되어 있는데요. It's specially prepared. 듣기 View video Golden Child : [FULL] Golden Child 3RD MINI ALBUM [WISH] COMEBACK SHOWCASE
오늘은 특별히... 소리가 왜 안 나지? Specially today. How come it doesn't play? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활4
vlive.english: Specially today. How come it doesn't play?

vlive.korean: 제가 특별히 같이 와줄게요. - 건들지 마. I will specially come with you. - Don't touch me. 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 지선이와 채영이의 이야기보따리🐿🐑
vlive.english: I will specially come with you. - Don't touch me.

examples.korean: So, I asked Su-won to join us and we started Spec Entertainment. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 수원이도 함께해서 지금의 스팩을 만들었어요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: So, I asked Su-won to join us and we started Spec Entertainment. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I heard you established an entertainment agency called "Spec Entertainment."Could you tell me more about your business? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 스팩 엔터테인먼트라는 기획사를 세웠다고 들었는데 사업에 대해서 더 말해줄래요? TIMES CORE
examples.english: I heard you established an entertainment agency called "Spec Entertainment."Could you tell me more about your business? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Click here to read the full story at the Hamilton Spectator. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 해밀튼 스팩테이터에서 전체 기사를 보려면 여기를 클릭하십시오. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 reese(erne****)

examples.korean: The compost is specially formulated for pot plants. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 혼합 비료는 특별히 화분용 화초를 위해 만든 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
